channel.title: Nobody cant come to my server
channel.description: Wats the problem, i have set my server to Moparscape Serverstatus and client link right, but my firend can't log in to my server, what i need to do? Its online all the time.

item.title: Nobody cant come to my server
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

then you cant host a server

Read full topic
item.source: Nobody cant come to my server

item.title: Nobody cant come to my server
item.dc:creator: @OwnerFinland OwnerFinland
item.description:
@OwnerFinland wrote:

[quote=“KingKj52, post:2, topic:341791”]Port Forward.

http://www.portforward.com/

Use your router/modem model, and any game. You need to portforward 43594, and, for the safe side, both TCP and UDP. It tells you how.[/quote]

I can’t portforward, i have tried.

Read full topic
item.source: Nobody cant come to my server

item.title: Nobody cant come to my server
item.dc:creator: @KingKj52 KingKj52
item.description:
@KingKj52 wrote:

Port Forward.

http://www.portforward.com/

Use your router/modem model, and any game. You need to portforward 43594, and, for the safe side, both TCP and UDP. It tells you how.

Read full topic
